types:type.name: employee

%dw 2.0
type employee = Array<{| empId: String, nationalIDNumber: String, eName: String, addressLn: String, addressCity: String, addressZIP: String, addressState: String, addressCountry: String, phone: String, gender: String, birthDate: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"empId\\\":\\\"E00001\\\",\\\"nationalIDNumber\\\":\\\"111111111\\\",\\\"eName\\\":\\\"Mr Jon Doe\\\",\\\"addressLn\\\":\\\"1 Area\\\",\\\"addressCity\\\":\\\"Atlanta\\\",\\\"addressZIP\\\":\\\"30303\\\",\\\"addressState\\\":\\\"GA\\\",\\\"addressCountry\\\":\\\"USA\\\",\\\"phone\\\":\\\"9999999999\\\",\\\"gender\\\":\\\"Male\\\",\\\"birthDate\\\":\\\"1977-01-19\\\"}]"}
